name: Cabot
description: Self-hosted, easily-deployable monitoring and alerts service - like a lightweight PagerDuty

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py syncdb --noinput && python manage.py migrate

CABOT_PLUGINS_ENABLED.description: Comma-separated list of cabot plugins to enable.

GRAPHITE_API.description: Backend url for querying graphite metrics. Remember the trailing slash

WWW_HTTP_HOST.description: Web url of cabot to use for notifications, sans scheme
